scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Visitation, with the Virgin Mary, clad in a blue robe, meeting Elizabeth, who is dressed in a purple gown and a yellow headdress. Elizabeth gestures with her hands towards Mary, who also extends a hand. Behind Mary, two figures, possibly attendants or angels, are visible. The background features a lush green landscape with trees and a distant cityscape characterized by towers and fortified walls, suggesting an urban setting. The entire scene is framed by an ornate golden decorative element at the top.
